2,715,500,000 XRP: ตัวชี้วัดสำคัญบ่งชี้การชะลอต้นทุนของ XRP

2,715,500,000 XRP: Key Metric Signals Pause on XRP Demand

2d ago//Caroline Amosun
altcoins
AI

Summary

TH

XRP กำลังแสดงสัญญาณตลาดหมดแรงในช่วงเวลาที่ตลาดคริปโตทั่วไปประสบกับการลดลง จากข้อมูลจากแพลตฟอร์มวิเคราะห์ออนเชน CryptoQuant ที่แสดงให้เห็นว่าสินทรัพย์สำรองของ XRP บนเว็บไซต์เทรดได้เพิ่มขึ้นถึง 2,715,500,000 XRP ซึ่งบ่งชี้ว่านักลงทุนมีแนวโน้มที่จะขายแทนการถือครองโทเค็น การเพิ่มขึ้นของสินทรัพย์สำรองบนเว็บไซต์โดยทั่วไปบ่งบอกถึงความต้องการที่ลดลง ซึ่งเมื่อเทียบกับการเคลื่อนไหวราคา ทำให้ XRP ลดลงจนถึงราคา 1.50 ดอลลาร์สหรัฐซึ่งเป็นราคาที่ไม่เคยเห็นมาตั้งแต่เดือนพฤศจิกายน 2024 แม้ว่าการลดลงในช่วง 24 ชั่วโมงล่าสุดจะอ่อนกว่า ลดลงเพียง 2.68% ซึ่งน้อยกว่าการลดลงก่อนหน้านี้ที่เกิน 5%

EN

XRP is experiencing bearish momentum amid a broad crypto market downturn, with key metrics indicating declining demand. According to on-chain analytics platform CryptoQuant, the XRP exchange reserve has surged to 2,715,500,000 XRP, suggesting traders are selling rather than holding the token. This increase in exchange reserves typically signals halted demand as tokens move from private wallets back to exchanges rather than the reverse which would indicate buying pressure. The price action has correspondingly weakened, with XRP retesting the $1.50 level not seen since November 2024, though the recent daily decline of 2.68% is less severe than previous drops of over 5%.

Key Points

  • XRP exchange reserves increased to 2,715,500,000 XRP, indicating reduced demand
  • Rising exchange reserves typically suggest traders are selling rather than holding
  • XRP has retested the $1.50 level not seen since November 2024, though the recent decline is less severe than previous drops

Article

XRP has continued to flash bearish signals as nearly all of its key metrics are moving in response to the broad pullback seen across the crypto market. While momentum has continued to fade, XRP traders are beginning to be cautious as data from on-chain analytics platform CryptoQuant shows that the XRP exchange reserve has increased to 2,715,500,000 XRP. XRP demand on pause While the exchange reserve of XRP represents the total number of the tokens combined held by all supported exchanges, including Binance , Coinbase and others, it serves as a crucial metric to weigh investor sentiment and the overall behavior of traders. HOT Stories Usually, when this metric declines, it means that more tokens are being moved out of the exchanges to private wallets for buying purposes amid rising demand among retail and institutional investors. You Might Also Like On the other hand, when this metric increases, as seen over the last day, it suggests that demand has been halted and traders are selling off their holdings rather than hold them, especially in periods of consolidation or broad crypto market downturn. While the crypto market has remained on a downside trajectory for multiple days with leading crypto assets like Bitcoin, XRP and others, retesting their multimonth lows, it is not a surprise that the asset’s exchange reserve has continued to rise. XRP retests $1.50 With the surge in XRP’s exchange reserve coinciding with a long-persisting price drawdown, it appears that the ongoing correction in the price of XRP might be far from ending. As the asset has continued to fail on every attempt to recover, it has now retested $1.50, a level not seen since November 2024. Source: Trading View While the heavy price correction appears to be slightly cooling down, XRP has only dipped by 2.68% over the last day, unlike the heavy declines of over 5% seen in previous days.
